record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - April 02, 2008)

[Page: S2364]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Eric Reither from Senator Ensign's office be granted floor privileges for the duration of the debate on H.R. 3221.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
